snippet: Wise Dan, the 2012 Horse of the Year, took control at the top of the stretch to win the $300,000 Maker’s 46 Mile at Keeneland in his first start of the year.
abstract: Wise Dan, 2012 Horse of the Year, wins Maker's 46 Mile in his first start of 2013.
lead_paragraph: Wise Dan, the 2012 Horse of the Year, took control at the top of the stretch to win the $300,000 Maker’s 46 Mile at Keeneland in his first start of the year.

headline.seo: Wise Dan Wins Maker’s 46 Mile at Keeneland
headline.main: Wise Dan Wins Maker’s 46 Mile at Keeneland
